title: @RIOT Can we get an update on the progress Illaoi's next skin?
body:
Kindred was released just before Illaoi in October 2015 and got their second skin (super galaxy kindred) in may 2016, 7 months after release.

Jhin was released in February 2016 and received his second skin (blood moon jhin) just recently in February 2017, a year after release.

Illaoi was released November 24th 2015.  Still no skin.

Now this by itself doesn't bother me all that much because I understand riot is a business and illaoi as a champion has a pretty small niche of players.  Jhin and kindred are certainly going to be getting skins faster and more often by virtue of being popular champions. 

What does irk me is that zero mention of a upcoming skin at all and the fact that Zyra is now getting a new skin. (check it out here http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/02/pbe-preview-dragonslayer-xin-zhao-and.html it looks amazing)

Sure zyra is popular and is being played in competative (so is illaoi now lol, she just got played in EU https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_I0SdVpT6dM&t=43s games are in description)  but even Riot has stated how notoriously laborious it is to make a skin for zyra.  She now has 2 great skins.  

Can we use half that zyra skin team make some chromas for Illaoi?  

TL;DR  Hey Riot, some info on a new illaoi skin or chromas would be great.

replies.body: If possible, some update on these guys' skins too {{champion:136}} {{champion:83}}
